name: Vigilante Weekend
description:
Welcome to Bidwell City. The year is 20XX and things couldn't be worse. Criminals and organizations brazenly operate and control the city, and strange things are starting to happen.

It's up to you to take Bidwell City back. It's up to you to TAKE VENGEANCE.

  • Upgrade and enhance your Vigilante with weapon kits, armor, mods, and choose among 25+ skills.
  • Find and recruit other vigilantes with their own stories to aid you.
  • Take on the criminal leaders of Bidwell City in challenging missions.

This project is currently in Early Access/Development. Features, mechanics, and assets will change as it progresses. Thank you for your support and patience, and we hope you enjoy the game!
